purpose: To streamline the integration and management of third-party APIs by providing a centralized control system.
principle: Built with Go, it uses a combination of caching, rate limiting, and orchestration techniques to enhance API consumption and management.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with support for custom plugins and comprehensive API documentation for easy integration.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features and potential stability issues.
name: lunar
description: lunar.dev: Ground Control for 3rd Party APIs
highlight: Provides a unified interface for managing and interacting with multiple third-party APIs efficiently.
